text: Máire Hendron is a Northern Irish politician who was appointed to represent Belfast East in the Northern Ireland Assembly for the Alliance Party, after incumbent MLA Naomi Long was elected to the European Parliament . She resigned in January 2020.New MLA - Belfast East Constituency - 08 January 2020 She formerly sat as a Councillor on Belfast City Council and held the position of Deputy Lord Mayor of Belfast. ==References== Category:Alliance Party of Northern Ireland MLAs Category:Living people Category:Northern Ireland MLAs 2017– Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Máire Hendron
